course_description: This course is taken concurrently with the second year of contextual education or contextual education-teaching parish. This course is an integrative experience. Students reflect on their theological preparation at Candler and its pragmatic meaning for the future of black and/or multiracial church communities.
sections: Class Nbr: 5318, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: N. Phillips, Status: Open
